feature: This is a full-stack project. It is an e-learning-based website. Here students can choose a class and see the teachers list and teachers can upload courses they want to teach.

This is a full-stack project. It is an e-commerce website. Here users can add toys for sale and see the toy list and details.This website has user authentication, a private route, and curd operations.
This is a full-stack project. It is about chefs and recipes. Here users can see and know about some extraordinary chefs and recipes.
This project is built with React. This is a job hunting website. Here user can see jobs. You can know the details of each job and when you can apply.A user can filter jobs type wise.
This is a React project. This project is technology base blog project. Here users can bookmark blogs. A user can count the time spent reading blogs.
This is a javascript project. In this project a user can come and take quiz and see his quiz result. You can also give how long it took him to take the quiz.
